thag1.1:6.1: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
thag1.1:7.1: Like the lions of mighty fang
thag1.1:7.3: hear now from those who’ve practiced well
thag1.1:8.1: What their name, and what their clan,
thag1.1:8.2: and how they lived by the teaching;
thag1.1:8.3: how dedicated were those wise ones,
thag1.1:9.4: they spoke about it in these words.
thag1.1:11.1: My little hut is roofed and pleasant, sheltered from the wind:
thag1.1:11.2: so rain, sky, as you please!
thag1.1:11.3: My mind is serene and freed,
thag1.1:11.4: I practice wholeheartedly: so rain, sky!
thag1.1:12.1: It was thus that this verse was recited by the senior venerable Subhūti.
